issue.message: The current server URL '/v1.33' is a relative path and does not provide flexibility for different Docker instance domains or API versions.

repairs.action_taken: Updated the first server entry to use a templated URL 'https://{your-docker-instance-domain}/api/v{api-version-number}' with defined variables. The 'your-docker-instance-domain' variable defaults to 'localhost:2375', and the 'api-version-number' variable defaults to '1.33' with an enum of supported versions derived from the API documentation.
